src:
Saung di Ramawangun Jaktim Terbakar, 1 Orang Terluka
02 Nov 2019, 23:09 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Sebuah bangunan saung di Jalan Wisma Jaya, RT 6/RW 11, Rawamangun, Jakarta Timur (Jaktim) terbakar. Dalam peristiwa ini, seorang warga menderita luka bakar di bagian tangan.
"Korban luka-luka pemilik kios bensin eceran, luka bakar di tangannya. Dilarikan ke IGD (Instalasi Gawat Darurat) RS Persahabatan," kata petugas senkom Sudin Pemadam Kebakaran Jaktim, Gatot Sulaiman, ketika dikonfirmasi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Gatot menjelaskan api berasal dari kios bensin eceran milik korban yang telaknya bersebelahan dengan saung. Gatot belum bisa menjelaskan pemicu timbulnya api.
"(Penyebab kebakaran) diduga karena bensin eceran, lalu merambat ke saung. Itu saung kecil untuk orang tua murid menunggu anak TK pulang sekolah, saungnya di depan TK Tarakanita" ujar dia.
Kebakaran terjadi pukul 21.05. Gatot mengatakan sebanyak 10 unit mobil pemadam kebakaran dikerahkan ke lokasi untuk menjinakan api.
"Sekarang sudah selesai penanganan. Kejadian pukul 21.05 WIB, selesai penanganan pukul 21.32 WIB," jelas dia.

(aud/fdu)
text:
Saung in Ramawangun East Jakarta Burned, 1 Person Injured
02 Nov 2019, 23:09 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - A saung building on Jalan Wisma Jaya, RT 6 / RW 11, Rawamangun, East Jakarta (East Jakarta) caught fire. In this incident, a resident suffered burns on the hands.
"The wounded wounded retail petrol kiosk owner, burns on his hand. He was thrown into the emergency room (Emergency Department) Friendship Hospital," said senkom officer of East Jakarta Fire Department, Gatot Sulaiman, when confirmed AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019) .
Gatot explained that the fire originated from the retail petrol stalls owned by the victims who were immediately adjacent to the gazebo. Gatot could not yet explain the trigger for the fire.
"(The cause of the fire) was allegedly due to retail gasoline, then spread to the gazebo. It was a small gazette for parents of students waiting for kindergarten children to come home from school, their gates in front of Tarakanita Kindergarten" he said.
The fire broke out at 21.05. Gatot said as many as 10 fire trucks were deployed to the location to tame the fire.
"Now the handling has been completed. The incident occurred at 21.05 WIB, the handling was finished at 21.32 WIB," he explained.

(aud / fdu)
